title: Did Sen. Lindsey Graham Call Trump a ‘Race-Baiting, Xenophobic Bigot’ in 2015?
subtitle: An online graphic accurately quoted the South Carolina Republican disparaging his then-opponent on CNN.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: Sen. Lindsey Graham called President Donald Trump a "race-baiting xenophobic bigot" in 2015 but in 2018 claimed that he had "never heard him make a single racist statement."
